Ahmed Zaki Metwally Abdelrahman Badawi (Arabic; 18 Nọvemba 1949 - 27 Machị 2005), nke a na-akpọkarị Ahmed Zaki (Arabic), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Egypt
A maara ya site na nkà ya, nkà, na ikike ime ka ọ bụrụ
Ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama maka ike ya na ihuenyo
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ pụtara na mbụ na obere ọrụ n'ime egwuregwu na-atọ ọchị, a na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwoke kachasị nwee nkà, ọkachasị na ọrụ dị egwu na ọdachi
Zaki nwere ihe nkiri 6 na ndepụta ihe nkiri 100 kachasị elu nke Egypt
A mụrụ Ahmed Zaki n'obodo Zagazig, ihe dịka kilomita 50 n'ebe ugwu Cairo, Egypt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zagazig's Crafts School n'afọ 1967, wee gaa Cairo ịmụ ihe nkiri tupu ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Cairo Higher Institute for Drama Studies n'afọ 1974
